group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*...@Things have finally calmed down.

group_1.textRight: That's New Year's for ya...

group_1.textLeft: Quite the busy time.
Everyone, thank you for helping with@the guest house.
With that many customers for the new year,@you were all a great help,
though I am incredibly sorry for putting you@through the trouble over your own vacation...

group_1.textRight: No no, we're the ones who offered to help, after all.
I had nothin' to do back home, so if anything@this made it better for me!
Besides, we owe a great deal to you and your home.
It was great that we could repay in kind.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.
Mother seems like she can handle the rest,
so now that you have all worked day after day,@spend the rest of your vacation relaxing.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* This will be our New Year's then.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, we have ozoni. Would you like some?

group_1.textRight: The Cradle of the Earth's ozoni...
...is exquisite from what I hear, so I will more than@gladly accept your offer.

group_1.textLeft: The dashi is incredible.

group_1.textRight: And the mochi's so springy!

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm glad.
The flavor of ozoni differs from house to house,
so I was worried it wouldn't be to your taste.

group_1.textRight: Now that you mention it, it's totally different@from eating at my place.
At my parents', we have way more meat@than veggies.

group_1.textLeft: As for my home, we use the game we catch in ours.
As such, the meat in ours varies every time@it is made.

group_1.textRight: My home isn't much different from Rabi's home,
but sometimes we do flavor it with miso.

group_1.textLeft: Miso...?

group_1.textRight: Mama seemed to have picked it up from someone@who moved from the Kansai region.
A soy sauce base is good, but miso is also delicious,@you see~
We really are all over the place!

group_1.textLeft: Hearing how Hime and everyone does theirs@could be interesting too.

group_1.textRight: For sure!@I'll be sure to ask Yuna and all them.

group_1.textLeft: I will inquire the Tokime Clan as well.
Then I, Lady Nayuta and the people@of Kamihama City...
And next year I will recreate the flavors.

group_1.textRight: Next year...?
*Giggle* The year has only just begun, and yetâ€”
Hasty, aren't we?

group_1.textLeft: That may be so.
But Tamaki has brought us to this moment,
so I'm hoping to envision many futures.
I'm sure she would be happy to know that.

group_1.textRight: Then once we've finished eating...
We should try our first calligraphy of the year.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, first let's write down our resolutions@for the year.
